thread.section_title: Hotel Pas de Calais - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A beautiful small boutique hotel
thread.title_full: A beautiful small boutique hotel - Review of Hotel Pas de Calais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: schma2017
title: A beautiful small boutique hotel
text:
We stayed in this hotel over the weekend and really like the atmosphere from this hotel. It's a small boutique hotel at St. Germain area with a nice sitting/lobby/breakfast area in the middle of the hotel. All the staffs there are very friendly, helpful and polite.
You can find tons of beautiful cafés, fantastic restaurants and high-end boutiques around this area. Le Bon Marche, Rue de Sevres, Louvré are walking distance from this hotel.
The room is not super big, but it's enough for 2 persons and it's very clean. Overall, we're pretty satisfied with this hotel. Definitely a hidden gem in St. Germain and we will come back and stay with them if we ever come back to Paris for a weekend gateway :)
